name: Dream Tear - RE Elementar Rising
description:
A game about a team of Elementar (beings who use elements of many kinds), who venture to a planet known as Terraldyn. Their mission is to seek out remnants of a force known as Alien Ministry.

Engine test is now available to try out!

New and improved platform game action system, which the series will now follow. Formulated from the currently in working sequel Dream Tear 4!  Play the start of the game series as it's been intended since the beginning.
